cpu: AMD A8-3870 APU with Radeon(tm) HD Graphics
notes: No sound, Menu buttons don't seem to be working, screen turns black every now and then, than shows the main menu, than the map. Hard to play and also the game won't shut down if the buttons are not working. Gotta go into task manager to close it forcefully.
title: Panzer Corps

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 6000 (Broadwell GT3) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Played 1st scenario in campaign reasonably well (some glitches), entered 2nd scenario and almost completely locked up all mouse/keyboard input. Except couple of keyboard shortcuts still worked, opened ctrl-alt-f1 terminal, had to kill -9 all processes associated with steam/panzer/wine to get computer working.
title: Panzer Corps

cpu: AMD A8-3870 APU with Radeon(tm) HD Graphics
notes: Map appears black and no buttons can be clicked. However, ALT-Tabbing fixes it. Has to be done at the beginning of every scenario but afterwards works just great.
